title: test_AnnexRepo_get_contentlocation fails on crippledfs

labels.name: crippled-filesystems
labels.description: Issue concerned with operation on crippled filesystems, regardless of OS

body:
Happened with gh-4708 running on an exFAT SSD.

```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.support.tests.test_annexrepo.test_AnnexRepo_get_contentlocation(False,)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mih/env/datalad3-dev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 1042, in newfunc
    t(*(arg + (uri,)), **kw)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 715, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/tests/test_annexrepo.py", line 954, in _test_AnnexRepo_get_contentlocation
    (annex.pathobj / key_location).resolve())
AssertionError: PosixPath('/media/mih/Samsung_T5/tmp/datalad_temp_clone_url_q873qcob/test-annex.dat') != PosixPath('/media/mih/Samsung_T5/tmp/datalad_temp_clone_url_q873qcob/.git/annex/objects/8f8/9ce/SHA256E-s28--2795fb26981c5a687b9bf44930cc220029223f472cea0f0b17274f4473181e7b.dat/SHA256E-s28--2795fb26981c5a687b9bf44930cc220029223f472cea0f0b17274f4473181e7b.dat')
```
